text: Isomerida lineata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Henry Walter Bates in 1874. It is known from Brazil, Bolivia, Colombia, Nicaragua and Peru.BioLib.cz - Isomerida lineata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1874
title: Isomerida lineata
